content: **find the free pattern on my website ** https //www dublinbaycrochet com/blog/crochet-blanket please note only the pdf version is available in 13 sizes **watch the full video tutorial here ** https //youtu be/bxvlf-t3jvq use the code youtube and enjoy 40% off crafted with beginners in mind this easy-level crochet blanket pattern is available in 13 versatile sizes ensuring the perfect fit for every cozy corner of your home whether you re looking to drape it over a crib in a nursery or add a touch of warmth to your living room this blanket is the ideal choice the pattern beautifully mimics the appearance of little bricks reminiscent of a cozy fall evening by the fireplace we ve chosen two harmonious shades of brown that result in a blanket that embodies the rich warm hues of fall but that s not all with your purchase you ll receive *detailed written instructions *photos showcasing each step *a comprehensive stitch diagram to guide you by choosing this pattern you re not just investing in a product you re gaining a valuable skill set the end result a high-quality handcrafted blanket that you can take pride in ☑ instant download pdf file for brick lane blanket crochet pattern crochet a fun and beautiful crochet pattern for autumn ☑ skill level beginner crochet ☑ this pattern includes instructions to make a blanket in thirteen 13 sizes you can choose any size and from there work the necessary amount of stitches and row to create your crochet blanket ☑ language american terms written in english ☑ you could use any yarn from your stash and play with different colour combinations here s what you will need any dk yarn the pattern includes more information about the yarn used and how much yarn you will need for each size 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle i hope you like this pattern and have fun making it it is a lovely project for fall and winter if you enjoy making this pattern i would love to know join me on instagram https //www instagram com/leonela diy/ scissors and measuring tape
